HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
PPL: 135 Kč pro objednávky < 1499 Kč, zdarma pro objednávky > 1500 Kč.
Balík České pošty do 30kg: 130 Kč pro objednávky < 1499 Kč, zdarma pro objednávky > 1500 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Doručování zásilek probíhá standardně následující den od 8:00 do 18:00.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Při hmotnosti balíku, který je vyšší než požadovaný limit (30 kg) pro přepravu „ Balíku do ruky „ si firma Sevt a.s vyhrazuje možnost změnit způsob dopravy.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Doručování zásilek probíhá standardně následující den od 8:00 do 18:00.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna, Balíkovna, PPL Parcelshop: 75 Kč pro objednávky < 1499 Kč, zdarma pro objednávky > 1500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 75 Kč pro objednávky < 1499 Kč, zdarma pro objednávky > 1500 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 30 Kč pro objednávky < 199 Kč, zdarma pro objednávky > 200 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: SEVT.cz offers several delivery methods within the Czech Republic, including Home Delivery, Parcel Shops/Lockers, and In-Store Pickup. Home delivery is handled by PPL and Česká pošta. Parcel shop and locker services are provided by Zásilkovna, PPL Parcelshop, and Balíkovna. In-store pickup is available at two locations: Prague and České Budějovice.
PRICING: Free shipping is available for most services on orders over 1,500 Kč. For in-store pickup, the threshold for free service is 200 Kč. Standard shipping fees range from 75 Kč to 135 Kč for orders below the free shipping threshold. Cash on delivery (COD) is available for most options with a 40 Kč surcharge.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery is generally fast, with most shipments dispatched for next-business-day delivery. The company also ships to Slovakia via PPL on a COD basis, but free shipping does not apply. For bulky items (e.g., over 30kg for Česká pošta), the company reserves the right to change the shipping method.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly in a table on the 'Doprava a platba' page, making it easy to compare costs, providers, and free shipping thresholds. Detailed explanations for each service are provided below the table. The information is comprehensive and user-friendly.
